text: Donata Minorati (born 4 March 1965) is an Italian rower. She competed in the women's quadruple sculls event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Italian female rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Italy Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Donata Minorati
